body.p: Dennis Fox (it is said) Killed Pat. Caulay June 7th 1865 in Louisville Ky.
Fox is an Irish labourer about 26 years of age -- 5 ft 7 or 8 inches high -- spare, with sharp features -- light brown hair -- sandy complexion -- wide mouth -- flat nose and down look --

The above description of Dennis Fox has been handed me by the brother of the murdered man. Fox has fled. It is thought that the offer of a suitable reward by your Excellency would secure his arrest. The friends of of the murdered man are poor and I recommend the offer by your Excellency of a reward of about $150 or $200.

Reward
$250
For Dennis Fox
Offered 27 June 1865
